juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   Light-colored room walls
*   Light-colored tiled floor
*   Ceiling with three white spherical pendant lights
*   Recessed ceiling spotlights
*   Black-framed sliding glass door on the left side of the room
*   View into a kitchen area through the sliding door
*   Rectangular dining table with a light-colored top and black legs/frame
*   Set of accompanying dining chairs, primarily black, some with light-colored seats
*   Small potted green plant centered on the dining table
